languages.text: "Ранее Футфолом заправлял Наместник, ведший дела с несколькими преступными фракциями сразу, но с ним произошел "несчастный случай". После этого бразды правления принял Владайм Токара, чье назначение весьма выгодно не только Касбаллике, но и их самому могущественному союзнику в Просторе Коронус — Вольному Торговцу Каллигосу Винтерскейлу".

traits.locale_text: "Ранее Футфолом заправлял Наместник, ведший дела с несколькими преступными фракциями сразу, но с ним произошел "несчастный случай". После этого бразды правления принял Владайм Токара, чье назначение весьма выгодно не только Касбаллике, но и их самому могущественному союзнику в Просторе Коронус — Вольному Торговцу Каллигосу Винтерскейлу".

languages.text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."
languages.original_text: "Ранее Футфолом заправлял Наместник, ведший дела с несколькими преступными фракциями сразу, но с ним произошел "несчастный случай". После этого бразды правления принял Владайм Токара, чье назначение весьма выгодно не только Касбаллике, но и их самому могущественному союзнику в Просторе Коронус — Вольному Торговцу Каллигосу Винтерскейлу".

traits.locale_text: "Previously Footfall had been run by a Governor dealing with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an "accident". The reigns of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

"Previously Footfall had been run by a Governor dealing with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an "accident". The reigns of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

"Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

"Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

"Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

languages.text: «El anterior Señor de Paso negociaba con varias facciones criminales a la vez, pero sufrió un "accidente". El poder recayó sobre Vladaym Tocara, cuyo nombramiento no solo beneficia a la Kasballica, sino también a su principal aliado en la Extensión de Koronus: el Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale».
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: «El anterior Señor de Paso negociaba con varias facciones criminales a la vez, pero sufrió un "accidente". El poder recayó sobre Vladaym Tocara, cuyo nombramiento no solo beneficia a la Kasballica, sino también a su principal aliado en la Extensión de Koronus: el Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale».

languages.text: “落脚港的前任总督同时与好几家犯罪集团做生意，但他后来遭遇了一场‘意外’，于是弗拉迪姆·托卡拉便接管了他的位置。自从他担任总督之后，受益的不仅仅是卡斯巴利卡集团，还包括他们在科罗努斯扩区最强大的盟友——行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港的前任总督同时与好几家犯罪集团做生意，但他后来遭遇了一场‘意外’，于是弗拉迪姆·托卡拉便接管了他的位置。自从他担任总督之后，受益的不仅仅是卡斯巴利卡集团，还包括他们在科罗努斯星域最强大的盟友——行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。”

languages.text: 「前にフットフォールを運営していたリージュは、一気に複数の犯罪勢力と取引していたのですが、”事故”に遭ってしまいました。権力の手綱をヴラダイム・トカラが引いて、彼の任命でカスバリカだけではなく、彼がコロヌス・エクスパンスで最も仲良くしている自由開拓者カリゴス・ウィンタースケールも美味しい想いをしました」
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: 「前にフットフォールを運営していたリージュは、一気に複数の犯罪勢力と取引していたのですが、”事故”に遭ってしまいました。権力の手綱をヴラダイム・トカラが引いて、彼の任命でカスバリカだけではなく、彼がコロヌス・エクスパンスで最も仲良くしている自由開拓者カリゴス・ウィンタースケールも美味しい想いをしました」

languages.text: "Footfall wurde zuvor von einem Lehnsherren geleitet, der mit mehreren kriminellen Gruppierungen auf einmal Geschäfte machte, aber er erlag einem 'Unfall'. Die Zügel der Macht wurden von Vladaym Tocara übernommen, dessen Ernennung nicht nur der Kasballica nützt, sondern auch deren mächtigstem Verbündeten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung – Freihändler Calligos Winterzunder."
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: "Footfall wurde zuvor von einem Lehnsherren geleitet, der mit mehreren kriminellen Gruppierungen auf einmal Geschäfte machte, aber er erlag einem 'Unfall'. Die Zügel der Macht wurden von Vladaym Tocara übernommen, dessen Ernennung nicht nur der Kasballica nützt, sondern auch deren mächtigstem Verbündeten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung – Freihändler Calligos Winterzunder."

languages.text: « L'ancien suzerain de Castel faisait affaire avec plusieurs factions criminelles à la fois, jusqu'à ce qu'il lui arrive un malheureux "accident". C'est donc Vladaym Tocara qui a repris les rênes, ce qui avantage non seulement la Kasballica, mais aussi son plus puissant allié des Étendues de Koronus : le libre-marchand Calligos Winterscale. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: « L'ancien suzerain de Castel faisait affaire avec plusieurs factions criminelles à la fois, jusqu'à ce qu'il lui arrive un malheureux "accident". C'est donc Vladaym Tocara qui a repris les rênes, ce qui avantage non seulement la Kasballica, mais aussi son plus puissant allié des Étendues de Koronus : le libre-marchand Calligos Winterscale. »

languages.text: "Önceleri Binliman, aynı anda birkaç suç örgütüyle çalışan bir Emîr tarafından yönetiliyordu. Sonra başına bir 'kaza' geldi. Vladaym Tocara ipleri eline aldı. Makama gelişi; yalnızca Kasballica'nın değil, aynı zamanda Koronus Enginliği'ndeki en güçlü müttefiklerinin, yani Hür Tacir Carlligos Winterscale'in de çıkarına oldu."
languages.original_text: "Footfall was previously run by a Liege who did business with several criminal factions at once, but he suffered an 'accident.' The reins of power were picked up by Vladaym Tocara, whose appointment benefits not only the Kasballica but also their most powerful ally in the Koronus Expanse — Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman daha önce aynı anda birçok suç örgütüyle çalışan bir Emîr tarafından yönetiliyordu ama başına bir 'kaza' geldi. İpleri Vladaym Tocara eline aldı ve atadığı kişiler yalnızca Kasballica'nın değil, aynı zamanda Koronus Enginliği'ndeki en güçlü müttefiklerinin, yani Hür Tacir Carlligos Winterscale'in de çıkarına oldu."
